title: Add searchable dropdown/select controls for large lists

requirements.summary: Replace all dropdown Select controls in TaskFormDialog with searchable/filterable Select components supporting typing to filter options for Client Name, Task Category, Task Sub Category, Assigned Name, and Status
acceptanceCriteria: All dropdown selects in TaskFormDialog support search/filter functionality
Users can type to filter options in Client Name, Task Category, Sub Category, Assigned Name, and Status selects
Search/filter works efficiently with large lists (100+ items)
Filtered results update in real-time as the user types
UI remains consistent with existing Shadcn/Radix Select styling

file_operations.description: Replace the five dropdown Select controls (Client Name, Task Category, Task Sub Category, Assigned Name, Status) with Shadcn Combobox or Command components that support search/filter functionality. Maintain existing form validation and submission logic. Ensure the search functionality filters options as the user types and works efficiently with large lists (100+ items). Preserve the sentinel value handling for null status.

requirements.summary: Add searchable Select controls in TasksPage filter controls for filtering by Client Name, Task Category, Sub Category, Assigned Name, and Status
acceptanceCriteria: All filter dropdowns in TasksPage support search functionality
Users can type to quickly find and select filter values
Search works across Client Name, Category, Sub Category, Assignee, and Status filters
Filter selection remains functional with existing URL-based filter state

file_operations.description: Replace the filter dropdown Select controls (Client Name, Task Category, Sub Category, Assigned Name, Status) with searchable Shadcn Combobox or Command components. Maintain existing URL-based filter state management and ensure filter selection updates the URL parameters correctly. The search functionality should work efficiently with large option lists and update filtered results in real-time as the user types.

requirements.summary: Replace the Client Name selector in ClientDetailPage task list with a searchable Select component
acceptanceCriteria: Client selection in ClientDetailPage supports search/filter
Users can type to filter client options
Selection works correctly with existing client detail navigation

file_operations.description: Replace the Client Name selector control with a searchable Shadcn Combobox or Command component that allows users to type and filter client options. Ensure the selection correctly navigates to the selected client detail page and maintains existing functionality.

requirements.summary: Ensure all searchable Select implementations use Shadcn/Radix UI components with Combobox pattern or Command component for search functionality, maintaining consistency and accessibility
acceptanceCriteria: All searchable selects use consistent Shadcn/Radix UI patterns
Components maintain accessibility standards (keyboard navigation, ARIA attributes)
Visual styling matches existing select components
Search functionality is performant with large option lists (no lag when typing)

file_operations.description: Verify that all searchable Select implementations use Shadcn Combobox or Command component patterns consistently. Ensure keyboard navigation (arrow keys, Enter, Escape) works correctly, ARIA attributes are present for accessibility, and visual styling matches the existing UI. Test performance with large option lists (100+ items) to ensure no lag when typing.

Verify that all filter searchable Select implementations use consistent Shadcn Combobox or Command component patterns. Ensure keyboard navigation, ARIA attributes, visual consistency with existing selects, and performant search with large option lists.

Verify that the Client Name searchable Select uses consistent Shadcn Combobox or Command component patterns. Ensure keyboard navigation, ARIA attributes, visual consistency, and performant search functionality.
